mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plms_repayment_schedule ( code, current_period, total_period, repayment_date, amount, principal, interest, overdue, status, detail_code, user_code, create_date, modify_date, repaymented_principal, repaymented_interest, repaymented_overdue, service_fee, service_fee_penalty, repaymented_service_fee, repaymented_service_fee_penalty, bail, bail_penalty, repaymented_bail, repaymented_bail_penalty ) VALUES ( #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{repaymentDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{principal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{overdue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{repaymentedPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repaymentedInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repaymentedOverdue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{serviceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{serviceFeePenalty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repaymentedServiceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repaymentedServiceFeePenalty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bail,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bailPenalty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repaymentedBail,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repaymentedBailPenalty,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.select: SELECT sd.amount as repaymentAmount, sd.principal as repaymentPrincipal, sd.interest as repaymentInterest, sd.overdue AS repaymentOverdue, date_format(b.apply_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as applyTime, b.amount as applyAmount, b.borrow_period as borrowPeriod, date_format(rs.repayment_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as repaymentDate, sd.service_fee as serviceFee, sd.service_fee_penalty AS serviceFeePenalty, sd.bail, sd.bail_penalty as bailPenalty FROM plms_repayment_schedule rs join plms_repayment_schedule_detail sd on rs.code = sd.schedule_code join plms_paid_info pi on sd.paid_code = pi.code join plms_borrow_apply b on b.code = pi.borrow_code WHERE rs.code = #{repaymentCode}
mapper.update:
UPDATE plms_repayment_schedule s
s.amount = s.amount + #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
s.principal = s.principal + #{principal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
s.interest = s.interest + #{interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
s.overdue = s.overdue + #{overdue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
s.service_fee = s.service_fee + #{serviceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
s.repaymented_principal = s.repaymented_principal + #{repaymentedPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
s.repaymented_interest = s.repaymented_interest + #{repaymentedInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
s.repaymented_overdue = s.repaymented_overdue + #{repaymentedOverdue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
s.repaymented_service_fee = s.repaymented_service_fee + #{repaymentedServiceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
s.modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
s.bail = ifnull(s.bail, 0) + #{bail,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
s.bail_penalty = ifnull(s.bail_penalty, 0) + #{bailPenalty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
s.repaymented_bail = ifnull(s.repaymented_bail, 0) + #{repaymentedBail,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
s.repaymented_bail_penalty = ifnull(s.repaymented_bail_penalty, 0) + #{repaymentedBailPenalty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WHERE s.CODE = #{code}

UPDATE plms_repayment_schedule s
s.amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
s.principal = #{principal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
s.interest = #{interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
s.service_fee = #{serviceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
s.bail = #{bail,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
s.status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE s.CODE = #{code}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.`code`, a.current_period as currentPeriod, a.total_period as totalPeriod, date_format(a.repayment_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as repaymentDate, a.amount, a.principal, a.interest, a.overdue, a.`status`, a.detail_code as detailCode, a.user_code as userCode, date_format(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createDate, date_format(a.modify_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as modifyDate, a.repaymented_principal as repaymentedPrincipal, a.repaymented_interest as repaymentedInterest, a.repaymented_overdue as repaymentedOverdue, a.service_fee as serviceFee, a.service_fee_penalty as serviceFeePenalty, a.repaymented_service_fee as repaymentedServiceFee, a.repaymented_service_fee_penalty as repaymentedServiceFeePenalty FROM plms_repayment_schedule a, plms_account_detail b WHERE a.detail_code = b.`code` and b.contract_code=#{contractCode} and a.`status` != '00' and b.`status` != '0'

SELECT id, `code`, current_period as currentPeriod, total_period as totalPeriod, repayment_date as repaymentDate, amount, principal, interest, overdue, `status`, detail_code as detailCode, user_code as userCode, create_date as createDate, modify_date as modifyDate, repaymented_principal as repaymentedPrincipal, repaymented_interest as repaymentedInterest, repaymented_overdue as repaymentedOverdue, service_fee as serviceFee, service_fee_penalty as serviceFeePenalty, repaymented_service_fee as repaymentedServiceFee, repaymented_service_fee_penalty as repaymentedServiceFeePenalty, bail, bail_penalty as bailPenalty, repaymented_bail as repaymentedBail, repaymented_bail_penalty as repaymentedBailPenalty FROM plms_repayment_schedule WHERE status != '00' and code = #{code}
mapper.update:
UPDATE plms_repayment_schedule
repaymented_service_fee = ifnull(repaymented_service_fee,0) + #{repaymentedServiceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
repaymented_service_fee_penalty = ifnull(repaymented_service_fee_penalty,0) + #{repaymentedServiceFeePenalty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
repaymented_principal = ifnull(repaymented_principal,0) + #{repaymentedPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
repaymented_interest = ifnull(repaymented_interest,0) + #{repaymentedInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
repaymented_overdue = ifnull(repaymented_overdue,0) + #{repaymentedOverdue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
repaymented_bail = ifnull(repaymented_bail,0) + #{repaymentedBail,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
repaymented_bail_penalty = ifnull(repaymented_bail_penalty,0) + #{repaymentedBailPenalty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
status = #{status},
WHERE CODE = #{code}

UPDATE plms_repayment_schedule set repaymented_principal=#{repaymentedPrincipal}, repaymented_interest=#{repaymentedInterest}, repaymented_service_fee=#{repaymentedServiceFee}, repaymented_overdue=#{repaymentedOverdue}, repaymented_service_fee_penalty=#{repaymentedServiceFeePenalty}, status=#{status}, repaymented_bail=#{repaymentedBail}, repaymented_bail_penalty=#{repaymentedBailPenalty} WHERE code=#{code}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.`code`, a.current_period as currentPeriod, a.total_period as totalPeriod, date_format(a.repayment_date,'%Y%m%d') as repaymentDate, a.amount, a.principal, a.interest, a.overdue, a.`status`, a.detail_code as detailCode, a.user_code as userCode, a.create_date as createDate, a.modify_date as modifyDate, a.repaymented_principal as repaymentedPrincipal, a.repaymented_interest as repaymentedInterest, a.repaymented_overdue as repaymentedOverdue, a.service_fee as serviceFee, a.service_fee_penalty as serviceFeePenalty, a.repaymented_service_fee as repaymentedServiceFee, a.repaymented_service_fee_penalty as repaymentedServiceFeePenalty, a.bail, a.bail_penalty as bailPenalty, a.repaymented_bail as repaymentedBail, a.repaymented_bail_penalty as repaymentedBailPenalty, b.um_id as umId FROM plms_repayment_schedule a,plms_user_info b WHERE a.user_code=b.code and a.status=#{status} and b.status!='0' and date_format(a.repayment_date,'%Y%m%d') IN
#{item}

SELECT a.distribute_code as distributeCode, d.bms_code as bmsDistributeCode, a.agent_code as agentCode, count(a.agent_code) count FROM plms_repayment_schedule sch JOIN plms_account_detail ad ON sch.detail_code = ad. CODE JOIN plms_contract_info ctr ON ctr. CODE = ad.contract_code JOIN plms_apply_info a ON a. CODE = ctr.apply_code JOIN plms_distributor d ON a.distribute_code = d. CODE WHERE sch. STATUS = '02' and sch.repayment_date = #{repaymentDate} GROUP BY a.agent_code

SELECT a.distribute_code as distributeCode, d.bms_code as bmsDistributeCode, a.agent_code as agentCode, count(a.distribute_code) count FROM plms_repayment_schedule sch JOIN plms_account_detail ad ON sch.detail_code = ad. CODE JOIN plms_contract_info ctr ON ctr. CODE = ad.contract_code JOIN plms_apply_info a ON a. CODE = ctr.apply_code JOIN plms_distributor d ON a.distribute_code = d. CODE WHERE sch. STATUS = '02' and sch.repayment_date = #{repaymentDate} GROUP BY a.distribute_code

SELECT a.clerk as clerk FROM plms_repayment_schedule sch JOIN plms_account_detail ad ON sch.detail_code = ad. CODE JOIN plms_contract_info ctr ON ctr. CODE = ad.contract_code JOIN plms_apply_info a ON a. CODE = ctr.apply_code JOIN plms_distributor d ON a.distribute_code = d. CODE WHERE sch. STATUS = '02' and sch.repayment_date = #{repaymentDate} and a.agent_code = #{agentCode} group by a.clerk

SELECT count(1) FROM ( SELECT u. NAME FROM plms_repayment_schedule sch JOIN plms_account_detail ad ON sch.detail_code = ad. CODE JOIN plms_contract_info ctr ON ctr. CODE = ad.contract_code JOIN plms_apply_info a ON a. CODE = ctr.apply_code JOIN plms_distributor d ON a.distribute_code = d. CODE JOIN plms_customer u ON u.apply_code = a. CODE WHERE sch. STATUS = '02' AND u.is_main = '1' and sch.repayment_date = #{repaymentDate} and d.distribute_code = #{distributeCode} GROUP BY u. NAME ) n

SELECT a. CODE AS applyCode, d.abbr_name AS distributorName, d. CODE AS distributorCode, d.bms_code AS distributorBmsCode, c.abbr_name AS cityName, c. CODE AS cityCode, ifnull(sch.bail, 0) + ifnull(sch.bail_penalty, 0) + ifnull(sch.interest, 0) + ifnull(sch.principal, 0) + ifnull(sch.service_fee, 0) + ifnull(sch.service_fee_penalty, 0) + ifnull(sch.overdue, 0) AS amount FROM plms_repayment_schedule sch JOIN plms_account_detail ad ON sch.detail_code = ad. CODE JOIN plms_contract_info ctr ON ctr. CODE = ad.contract_code JOIN plms_apply_info a ON a. CODE = ctr.apply_code JOIN plms_distributor d ON a.distribute_code = d. CODE JOIN plms_city c ON c. CODE = d.city_no JOIN plms_customer u ON u.apply_code = a. CODE WHERE sch. STATUS = '02' AND u.is_main = '1' AND sch.repayment_date = #{repaymentDate} AND d.distribute_code = #{distributeCode}

SELECT a.distribute_code as distributeCode, d.bms_code as bmsDistributeCode, a.agent_code as agentCode, count(a.agent_code) count FROM plms_repayment_schedule sch JOIN plms_account_detail ad ON sch.detail_code = ad. CODE JOIN plms_contract_info ctr ON ctr. CODE = ad.contract_code JOIN plms_apply_info a ON a. CODE = ctr.apply_code JOIN plms_distributor d ON a.distribute_code = d. CODE WHERE sch. STATUS = '03' GROUP BY a.agent_code

SELECT a.clerk as clerk FROM plms_repayment_schedule sch JOIN plms_account_detail ad ON sch.detail_code = ad. CODE JOIN plms_contract_info ctr ON ctr. CODE = ad.contract_code JOIN plms_apply_info a ON a. CODE = ctr.apply_code JOIN plms_distributor d ON a.distribute_code = d. CODE WHERE sch. STATUS = '03' and a.agent_code = #{agentCode} group by a.clerk
